Package org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.plugin.reader

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ObservableReaderNotifier
    The ObservableReaderNotifier interface provides the API to notify the observers of a ObservableReader
    SmartInsertionReader  
    SmartRemovalReader
    Interface implemented by the readers able to handle natively the SE removal process.
    SmartSelectionReader
    Interface implemented by readers able to handle natively the SE selection process (e.g.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLocalReader
    Manage the loop processing for SeRequest transmission in a set and for SeResponse reception in a set
    AbstractMonitoringJob
    Monitoring jobs abstract class.
    AbstractObservableLocalReader
    This abstract class is used to manage the matter of observing SE events in the case of a local reader.
    AbstractObservableState
    Defines a state behaviour for a AbstractObservableLocalReader Handles AbstractObservableLocalReader.InternalEvent that might results on a switch of state.
    AbstractReader
    Abstract definition of an observable reader.
    CardAbsentPingMonitoringJob
    Ping the SE to detect removal thanks to the method AbstractObservableLocalReader.isSePresentPing().
    CardPresentMonitoringJob
    This monitoring job polls the SeReader.isSePresent() method to detect SE_INSERTED/SE_REMOVED
    ObservableReaderStateService
    Manages the internal state of an AbstractObservableLocalReader Process InternalEvent against the current state
    SmartInsertionMonitoringJob
    Detect the SE insertion thanks to the method SmartInsertionReader.waitForCardPresent().
    SmartRemovalMonitoringJob
    Detect the SE removal thanks to the method SmartRemovalReader.waitForCardAbsentNative().
    WaitForSeInsertion
    Wait for Se Insertion State
    WaitForSeProcessing
    Wait for Se Processing State
    WaitForSeRemoval
    Wait for Se Removal State
    WaitForStartDetect
    Wait for Start SE Detection
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractObservableLocalReader.InternalEvent  
    AbstractObservableState.MonitoringState
    The states that the reader monitoring currentState machine can have
